body_html:
Hi, I've been trying to install tensorflow with the ideas you gave me.
I tried this

Try to run bazel clean manually before running ./configure

and this

Explicitly state the cuda version, or maybe even better overwrite all default values (even if they match your requirements)

but it didn't work. Then I tried this

Maybe your cudnn version is somehow incompatible with the cuda version, for example if cuda was installed via apt and cudnn was installed manually. Ubuntu 14.04 currently has cudnn version 5.0.{5,6} and 5.1.{3, 5, 10} in the repos (says apt-cache madison libcudnn5. You seem to have version 5.0.4. Probably try the local solution with one of the versions above.

I installed cudNN version 5.1.10 locally. The error changes, but still failing.

I couldn't try this

Did you try a local install of cuda-8.0? #5447 mentions the tensorflow team only tests with cuda 8.0. This issue also seems to be related to yours.

because of the nvidia drivers installed.

At the end, the system operator updated the global cudnn version and now it works.

Thank you so much for your help.

body:
Hi, I've been trying to install tensorflow with the ideas you gave me.
I tried this

> Try to run bazel clean manually before running ./configure

and this

> Explicitly state the cuda version, or maybe even better overwrite all default values (even if they match your requirements)

but it didn't work. Then I tried this

> Maybe your cudnn version is somehow incompatible with the cuda version, for example if cuda was installed via apt and cudnn was installed manually. Ubuntu 14.04 currently has cudnn version 5.0.{5,6} and 5.1.{3, 5, 10} in the repos (says apt-cache madison libcudnn5. You seem to have version 5.0.4. Probably try the local solution with one of the versions above.

I installed cudNN version 5.1.10 locally. The error changes, but still failing.

I couldn't try this

> Did you try a local install of cuda-8.0? #5447 mentions the tensorflow team only tests with cuda 8.0. This issue also seems to be related to yours.

because of the nvidia drivers installed.

At the end, the system operator updated the global cudnn version and now it works.

Thank you so much for your help.
